Translations.Text: Sbuccuaen Oebbi kra illan deg igenwan, akked kra illan di tmurt. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab

D Neppa i Issuff$en seg ixxamen nnsen wid ijehlen seg At Tezmamt, i ujemmal amezwaru. Ur tuminem ara ad ff$en. Â£ilen leswao nnsen a ten sellken si Oebbi. Ikka yasen d Oebbi seg wanda ur bnin. Issekcem tugdi deg ulawen nnsen. Hudden ixxamen nnsen, s ifassen nnsen, akked ifassen n lmumnin. Meyyzet a wid ipwalin

Wid ized$en ixxamen, iumnen uqbel nnsen, eemmlen wid id iunagen $uosen. Ur neifen idmaren nnsen af wayen i sen ippunefken, smenyafen ten i iman nnsen, xas ma gwran d xuuuen. Wid irran akin ccea af yiman nnsen, widak d imerbae
